custom.translation[0].definitions[0].def: something that is done by people in a particular society because it is traditional

custom.translation[0].definitions[1].def: something that you usually do every day, or in a particular situation
custom.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: He awoke early, as was his custom.
custom.translation[0].definitions[2].def: the practice of regularly using a particular shop or business
custom.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: an advertisement to attract more custom
